name: LN_DOC_QUESN_TYP
description:
This table holds the type of question from the supporting documentation.





The LN_DOC_QUESN_NUM, LN_DOC_QUESN_TYP, and LN_DOC_QUESN_RESP tables are related to one another.  The number of lines in these tables will always be the same and values on the same line in each table will correspond to one another.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: LN_DOC_QUESN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item identifies the type of response needed for the question.
